Html:
Hi,

I'm using this component Ribbon in my new applications, I like to know if someone create a dynamyc menu with ribbon?

fo example I have roles of user: administrator, auditor, query, bookepper, etc...

when the user with specific role login to the system, then menu ribbon load with options of role?

If someone has ti?

 

Regards

Ricardo

The ribbon has support for 'application modes' which defines which controls show for different users.

see: http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/11/23/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-16-applicationmodes.aspx
